00007         function unhtmlentities($string)
00008         {
00009                 // replace numeric entities
00010                 $string = preg_replace('/&[lr]squo;/', '\'', $string);
00011                 $string = preg_replace('/&[lr]dquo;/', '"', $string);
00012                 return html_entity_decode($string, ENT_QUOTES);
00013         }
